title: Authors and Citation
text: Anaïs Thijssen. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Thijssen (2025). GDVIS: Compute visualize genetic distances. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://abthijssen.github.io/GDVIS/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {GDVIS: Compute and visualize genetic distances},   author = {Anaïs Thijssen},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://abthijssen.github.io/GDVIS/}, }

title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: Anaïs Thijssen (.b.thijssen@gmail.com) 2025-11-16

title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: GDVIS (Genetic Distance Visualization) R package allows compute visualize genetic distances subtypes disorder (2D mode), subtype external trait (3D mode), two different subtype definitions (2D_2D mode) three different traits (CD mode). Note heritabilities need 50:50 case-control scale. can achieved using Neffective LDSC (details, see paper). Check paper : [added] Check GDVIS website : https://gdvis.shinyapps.io/gdvis/.

title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: GDVIS mode computing visualizing single subtype disorder. use example major depressive disorder (MDD) childhood trauma (CT) paper. group controls group MDD cases. MDD cases divided individuals childhood trauma (subtype1-cases) invididuals without childhood trauma (subtype2-cases). Note important subtypes together form full set cases (e.g., comparing subtype consists three different groups, low impairment, medium impairment high impairment, union two groups set MDD cases). GDVIS needs following minimal input, needs list format: h2_sub1.con: heritability GWAS subtype1-cases (MDD childhood trauma) versus controls. h2_se_sub1.con: standard error heritability name_sub1: name subtype1-cases N_sub1: number individuals subtype1-cases group h2_sub2.con: heritability GWAS subtype2-cases (MDD without childhood trauma) versus controls. h2_se_sub2.con: standard error heritability name_sub2: name subtype2-cases N_sub1: number individuals subtype2-cases group name_allcases: name pool subtype1-cases subtype2-cases group name_con: name controls rg_sub1.con_sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation folder_location: folder want data stored filename: name file saving pop.prev_case: population prevalence cases (population prevalence MDD) optional variables can also add, allow GDVIS check calculated values LDSC values, result can found logfile. However, necessary can create input list without variables. optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS cases (pool subtype1-cases subtype2-cases) versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS cases (pool subtype1-cases subtype2-cases) versus controls GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2: heritability GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2: standard error heritability optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con: heritability GWAS ;; cases (pool subtype1-cases subtype2-cases) versus controls optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con: standard error heritability GDVIS run suggested evidence significant difference subgroups. Specifically, rg significantly different 1 (filter 1a) h2.sub1 clearly different h2.sub2 (filter 1b 1c), triangle plotted. occasions, triangle plotted plotted larger GWAS sample sizes (therefore smaller standard errors). GDVIS also run one heritabilities significant. Create input list Pass input list GDVIS_calc logfile also automatically generated saved, can find folder GDVIS_tutorial_output github. GDVIS_calc returns path RData object, put variable output (note RData object also saved). GDVIS_plot_2D takes input output generated GDVIS_calc. Note h2 rg values legend GDVIS estimated values optional LDSC values. Note can manually set axes limits (especially nice multiple triangles want make sure axes similar, can also help making legend appear outside triangle). Plot subtype
code: input.list <- list(   h2_sub1.con                                   = 0.1606,   h2_se_sub1.con                                = 0.0139,   name_sub1                                     = "With CT",   N_sub1                                        = 14146,   h2_sub2.con                                   = 0.0839,   h2_se_sub2.con                                = 0.0098,   name_sub2                                     = "Without CT",   N_sub2                                        = 16285,   name_allcases                                 = "all MDD cases",   name_con                                      = "controls",   rg_sub1.con_sub2.con                          = 0.6011,   rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con                       = 0.0610,   plot_title                                    = "Childhood Trauma",   folder_location                               = "GDVIS_tutorial_output",   filename                                      = "Childhood Trauma.minimum",   pop.prev_case                                 = 0.16,      # All variables below can optionally be added to the input.list   optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con        = 0.9111,      optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con     = 0.0167,    optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con        = 0.8765,       optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con     = 0.0198,        optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2                    = 0.1036,     optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2                 = 0.0162,      optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2           = 0.6995,      optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2        = 0.0389,        optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2           = -0.1544,    optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2        = 0.0983,      optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con                 = 0.0915,       optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con              = 0.0079) output <- GDVIS_calc(input.list) # GDVIS_plot_2D(output) This will run as well, but we will add some axes restaints  GDVIS_plot_2D(output, x_lower = -0.35, x_upper = 0.35, y_lower = -0.15, y_upper = 0.35)

what: GDVIS for one subtype with an external trait
title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: GDVIS can also plot external trait subtype visualization, making 3D plot. example add external trait Anxiety. GDVIS run input result invalid geometrical representation (see paper details). GDVIS needs following extra input: plot_3D: tells GDVIS want calculate subtype external trait set TRUE h2_ext: heritabitlity external trait (50/50 case_control ascertainment scale) h2_se_ext: standard error heritabilty rg_sub1.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS external trait rg_se_sub1.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation rg_sub2.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls GWAS external trait rg_se_sub2.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation name_ext: name external trait pop.prev_ext: population prevalence external trait, trait continuous, set prevalence 0.5 optional input well, allow GDVIS check calculated values LDSC values: optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.sub2_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases GWAS external trait optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.sub2_ext: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS cases (union subtype1-cases subtype2-cases) GWAS external trait optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation Create input list Pass input list GDVIS_calc logfile also automatically generated saved, can find folder GDVIS_tutorial_output github. Plot subtype external trait Pass output object plot function see plot. plot created .html, legend .png shiny app shows together Running code open window containing shiny object can move 3D space. RMarkdown file handle interactive shiny output, example resulting visualization code , see: https://gdvis.shinyapps.io/gdvis/ plot screenshot 3D interactive visualization. possible just make save plots without rendering make plots without showing labels.
code: input.list.3D <- list(      # 2D required input   h2_sub1.con                                   = 0.1606,   h2_se_sub1.con                                = 0.0139,   name_sub1                                     = "With CT",   N_sub1                                        = 14146,   h2_sub2.con                                   = 0.0839,   h2_se_sub2.con                                = 0.0098,   name_sub2                                     = "Without CT",   N_sub2                                        = 16285,   name_allcases                                 = "all MDD cases",   name_con                                      = "controls",   rg_sub1.con_sub2.con                          = 0.6011,   rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con                       = 0.0610,   plot_title                                    = "Childhood Trauma",   folder_location                               = "GDVIS_tutorial_output",   filename                                      = "Childhood Trauma",   pop.prev_case                                 = 0.16,       # 2D optional input      optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con        = 0.9111,      optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con     = 0.0167,    optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con        = 0.8765,       optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con     = 0.0198,        optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2                    = 0.1036,     optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2                 = 0.0162,      optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2           = 0.6995,      optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2        = 0.0389,        optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2           = -0.1544,    optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2        = 0.0983,      optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con                 = 0.0915,       optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con              = 0.0079,      # 3D required input   plot_3D                                       = TRUE,   h2_ext                                        = 0.0738,   h2_se_ext                                     = 0.0276,   rg_sub1.con_ext                               = 0.5883,   rg_se_sub1.con_ext                            = 0.1629,   rg_sub2.con_ext                               = 0.6665,   rg_se_sub2.con_ext                            = 0.1733,   name_ext                                      = "Anxiety",   pop.prev_ext                                  = 0.2,      # 3D optional input   optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.sub2_ext                = 0.1198,   optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.sub2_ext             = 0.1797,   optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_ext             = 0.6942,   optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_ext          = 0.1733) output.3D <- GDVIS_calc(input.list.3D) #GDVIS_plot_3D(output.3D, show.rendering = FALSE, show.names = FALSE) GDVIS_plot_3D(output.3D)

title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: GDVIS can compute visualize relationship two subtype definitions 3D geometrical space. need individual data subtype definitions information relation. GDVIS run input result invalid geometrical representation (see paper details) Besides single subtype information, GDVIS needs following: plot_2D.2D: tells GDVIS run subtype vs subtype mode rg_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype12-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation Create input list Pass input list GDVIS_calc logfile also automatically generated saved, can find folder GDVIS_tutorial_output github. function first create separate subtype plots (save ) create 3D visualization. Plot subtypes Pass output object plot function see plot. plot created .html, legend .png shiny app shows together Running code open window containing shiny object can 3D space. RMarkdown file handle interactive shiny output, example resulting visualization code , see: https://gdvis.shinyapps.io/gdvis/ plot screenshot 3D interactive visualization. possible just make save plots without rendering make plots without showing labels.
code: input.list.2D.2D <- list(    # Subgroup info triangle 1   triangle1.h2_sub1.con                                 = 0.1606,   triangle1.h2_se_sub1.con                              = 0.0139,   triangle1.name_sub1                                   = "With childhood trauma",   triangle1.N_sub1                                      = 14146,   triangle1.h2_sub2.con                                 = 0.0839,   triangle1.h2_se_sub2.con                              = 0.0098,   triangle1.name_sub2                                   = "without childhood trauma",   triangle1.N_sub2                                      = 16285,    triangle1.name_allcases                               = "all MDD cases",   triangle1.name_con                                    = "MDD controls",   triangle1.rg_sub1.con_sub2.con                        = 0.6011,   triangle1.rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con                     = 0.0610,    # General info triangle 1   triangle1.plot_title                                  = "Childhood Trauma",   triangle1.folder_location                             = "GDVIS_tutorial_output",   triangle1.filename                                    = "Childhood Trauma",   triangle1.pop.prev_case                               = 0.16,      # Optional input triangle 1   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con      = 0.9111,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con   = 0.0167,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con      = 0.8765,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con   = 0.0198,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2                  = 0.1036,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2               = 0.0162,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2         = 0.6995,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2      = 0.0389,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2         = -0.1544,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2      = 0.0983,   triangle1.optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con               = 0.0915,     triangle1.optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con            = 0.0079,      # Subgroup info triangle 2   triangle2.h2_sub1.con                                 = 0.1394,   triangle2.h2_se_sub1.con                              = 0.0147,   triangle2.name_sub1                                   = "With anxiety",   triangle2.N_sub1                                      = 11885,   triangle2.h2_sub2.con                                 = 0.0798,   triangle2.h2_se_sub2.con                              = 0.0098,   triangle2.name_sub2                                   = "without anxiety",   triangle2.N_sub2                                      = 18546,   triangle2.name_allcases                               = "all MDD cases",   triangle2.name_con                                    = "MDD controls",   triangle2.rg_sub1.con_sub2.con                        = 0.8451,   triangle2.rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con                     = 0.0720,    # General info triangle 2   triangle2.plot_title                                  = "Comorbid anxiety",    triangle2.folder_location                             = "GDVIS_tutorial_output",   triangle2.filename                                    = "Comorbid anxiety",   triangle2.pop.prev_case                               = 0.16,    # Optional input triangle 2   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con      = 0.9504,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con   = 0.0235,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con      = 0.9686,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con   = 0.0153,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2                  = 0.0450,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2               = 0.0166,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2         = 0.6503,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2      = 0.0752,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2         = 0.1302,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2      = 0.1870,   triangle2.optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con               = 0.0915,     triangle2.optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con            = 0.0079,    # Required data on triangle relations    rg_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2            = 0.4084,   rg_se_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2         = 0.1793,    rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con              = 0.9139,   rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con           = 0.0326,   rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con              = 0.7831,   rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con           = 0.0431,   rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con              = 0.8452,   rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con           = 0.0316,   rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con              = 0.8882,   rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con           = 0.0328,    # Type info   plot_2D.2D                                            = TRUE) output.2D.2D <- GDVIS_calc(input.list.2D.2D) #GDVIS_plot_3D(output.3D, show.rendering = FALSE, show.names = FALSE) GDVIS_plot_3D(output.3D)

title: Compute and visualize genetic distances
text: Create input list Note standard errors asked, need check whether data sensible plot. Pass input list GDVIS_calc logfile also automatically generated saved, can find folder GDVIS_tutorial_output github. Pass output object plot function see plot. plot created .html, legend .png shiny app shows together Running code open window containing shiny object can 3D space. RMarkdown file handle interactive shiny output, example resulting visualization code , see: https://gdvis.shinyapps.io/gdvis/ plot screenshot 3D interactive visualization. possible just make save plots without rendering make plots without showing labels. Plot subtype
code: input.list.CD <- list(   plot_CD                                       = TRUE,   name_trait1                                   = "SCZ_cases",   name_trait2                                   = "BIP_cases",   name_trait3                                   = "MDD_cases",   name_trait1.con                               = "SCZ_con",   name_trait2.con                               = "BIP_con",   name_trait3.con                               = "MDD_con",   rg_trait1_trait2                              = 0.6986,   rg_trait1_trait3                              = 0.3598,   rg_trait2_trait3                              = 0.4758,   h2_trait1                                     = 0.4118,   h2_trait2                                     = 0.2902,   h2_trait3                                     = 0.0703,   pop.prev_trait1                               = 0.004,   pop.prev_trait2                               = 0.01,   pop.prev_trait3                               = 0.16,   folder_location                               = "GDVIS_tutorial_output") output.CD <- GDVIS_calc(input.list.CD) #GDVIS_plot_CD(output.CD, show.rendering = FALSE, show.names = FALSE) GDVIS_plot_CD(output)

title: Calculate GDVIS parameters — GDVIS_calc
text: function calculates GDVIS parameters. Input based LDSC estimates. h2 needs observed scale 50:50 ascertainment. 2D input : h2_sub1.con: heritability GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls. h2_se_sub1.con: standard error heritability name_sub1: name subtype1-cases N_sub1: number individuals subtype1-cases group h2_sub2.con: heritability GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls. h2_se_sub2.con: standard error heritability name_sub2: name subtype2-cases N_sub1: number individuals subtype2-cases group name_allcases: name pool subtype1-cases subtype2-cases group name_con: name controls rg_sub1.con_sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls rg_se_sub1.con_sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation folder_location: folder want data stored filename: name file saving pop.prev_case: population prevalence cases optional variables can also add, allow GDVIS check calculated values LDSC values, result can found logfile. However, necessary can create input list without variables. optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS cases versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS cases versus controls GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_h2_sub1.sub2: heritability GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_h2_se_sub1.sub2: standard error heritability optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.con_sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.con_sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_sub2.con_sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub2.con_sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_h2_allcases.con: heritability GWAS allversus controls optional_LDSC_h2_se_allcases.con: standard error heritability

title: Calculate GDVIS parameters — GDVIS_calc
text: triangle.input.list input list parameters log_fun needs stay message, important webversion webversion needs stay FALSE

title: Calculate GDVIS parameters — GDVIS_calc
text: want plot subtype external trait, need additional input: plot_3D: tells GDVIS want calculate subtype external trait set TRUE h2_ext: heritabitlity external trait h2_se_ext: standard error heritabilty rg_sub1.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls GWAS external trait rg_se_sub1.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation rg_sub2.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls GWAS external trait rg_se_sub2.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation name_ext: name external trait pop.prev_ext: population prevalence external trait, trait continuous, set prevalence 0.5 optional input well, allow GDVIS check calculated values LDSC values: optional_LDSC_rg_sub1.sub2_ext: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases GWAS external trait optional_LDSC_rg_se_sub1.sub2_ext: standard error genetic correlation optional_LDSC_rg_allcases.con_ext: genetic correlation GWAS cases GWAS external trait optional_LDSC_rg_se_allcases.con_ext: standard error genetic correlation want compare two different subtypes, need following: input subtypes described , staarting triangle1./triangle2. e.g. triangle1.h2_sub1.con triangle2.h2_sub2.con plot_2D.2D: tells GDVIS run subtype vs subtype mode rg_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus subtype2-cases subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.sub2_triangle2.sub1.sub2: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype12-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub1.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype1-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub1.con_triangle2.sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation rg_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con: genetic correlation GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition GWAS subtype2-cases versus controls subtype definition B rg_se_triangle1.sub2.con_triangle2.sub2.con: standard error genetic correlation

title: Plot GDVIS 2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D
text: function plots GDVIS visualization based GDVIS parameters.

title: Plot GDVIS 2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D
code: GDVIS_plot_2D(   input_triangle_parameters,   x_lower = NULL,   x_upper = NULL,   y_lower = NULL,   y_upper = NULL )

title: Plot GDVIS 2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D
text: input_triangle_parameters path RData GDVIS output, ends 2D.triangle_parameters.RData x_lower set lower value x axis x_upper set upper value x axis y_lower set lower value y asis y_upper set upper value y axis

title: Plot GDVIS 2D.2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D_2D
text: function plots GDVIS visualization based GDVIS parameters.

title: Plot GDVIS 2D.2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D_2D
code: GDVIS_plot_2D_2D(   input_triangle_parameters,   show.rendering = TRUE,   webversion = FALSE )

title: Plot GDVIS 2D.2D plot — GDVIS_plot_2D_2D
text: input_triangle_parameters path RData GDVIS output, ends 2D_2D.triangle_parameters.RData show.rendering option show rendering plot external window, default TRUE webversion needs stay FALSE

title: Plot GDVIS 3D plot — GDVIS_plot_3D
text: function plots GDVIS visualization based GDVIS parameters.

title: Plot GDVIS 3D plot — GDVIS_plot_3D
code: GDVIS_plot_3D(   input_triangle_parameters,   show.rendering = TRUE,   show.names = TRUE,   webversion = FALSE )

title: Plot GDVIS 3D plot — GDVIS_plot_3D
text: input_triangle_parameters path RData GDVIS output, ends 3D.triangle_parameters.RData show.rendering option show rendering plot external window, default TRUE show.names option show names groups, default TRUE webversion needs stay FALSE

title: Plot GDVIS cross-disorder plot — GDVIS_plot_CD
text: function plots GDVIS visualization based GDVIS parameters.

title: Plot GDVIS cross-disorder plot — GDVIS_plot_CD
code: GDVIS_plot_CD(   input_triangle_parameters,   show.rendering = TRUE,   show.names = TRUE,   webversion = FALSE )

title: Plot GDVIS cross-disorder plot — GDVIS_plot_CD
text: input_triangle_parameters path RData GDVIS output, ends CD.triangle_parameters.RData show.rendering option show rendering plot external window, default TRUE show.names option show names groups, default TRUE webversion needs stay FALSE

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling rhs(lhs).
